ValidationRule.description: Send Profile should be selected only after Create Profile been selected.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: or(and(ISCHANGED(MSP_Customer_Profile_Automation__c),!ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(MSP_Customer_Profile_Automation__c),'Create Profile'), ISPICKVAL(MSP_Customer_Profile_Automation__c,'Send Profile'), Record_Type_Name__c = 'MSP Contracts'), and(ISPICKVAL(MSP_Customer_Profile_Automation__c,'Data Loaded'), Record_Type_Name__c = 'MSP Contracts', ISCHANGED(MSP_Customer_Profile_Automation__c), $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Select Create Profile and click Save to send Customer Profile manually.
